mapper.insert: insert into tbl_visit(id, owner, subject, contactsId, stage, priority, endDate, createBy, createTime, editBy, editTime, description, startTime, repeatType, noticeType) values (#{id},#{owner},#{subject},#{contactsId},#{stage},#{priority},#{endDate},#{createBy},#{createTime},#{editBy},#{editTime},#{description},#{startTime},#{repeatType},#{noticeType})
mapper.select: select user.name as owner, visit.subject, contacts.fullname as contactsId, visit.stage, visit.priority, visit.endDate from tbl_visit visit join tbl_contacts contacts join tbl_user user on visit.contactsId=contacts.id and visit.owner=user.id

select user.name as owner, visit.subject, visit.endDate, contacts.fullname as contactsId, visit.stage, visit.priority, visit.description, visit.startTime, visit.repeatType, visit.noticeType from tbl_visit visit join tbl_contacts contacts join tbl_user user on visit.contactsId=contacts.id and visit.owner=user.id where visit.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update tbl_visit set owner=(select name from tbl_user where id=#{owner}), subject=#{subject}, contactsId=(select fullname from tbl_contacts where id=#{contactsId}), stage=#{stage}, priority=#{priority}, endDate=#{endDate}, editBy=#{editBy}, editTime=#{editTime}, description=#{description}, startTime=#{startTime}, repeatType=#{repeatType}, noticeType=#{noticeType} where id=#{id}
